name: TANK 3030
description:
Hi!

For my 1st game ever published I decided to create a remake of one of my favourite games from childhood: "Tank 1990 Battle City".

I worked on it for around 4-5 months + some days for polishing (though there were long breaks for other things).

I did everything from scratch using Stencyl, MS Paint and some websites to create SFX.

Aand here I am now...

25 levels to beat and a cooperation mode available!

Controls:

- Player #1

W, S, A, D

SPACE

- Player #2

ARROWS

ENTER

P - pause the game

Secret level:

Psst, there's a secret level that can be accessed from the main menu. It allows you to try out all the available power-ups, types of tiles and kinds of enemy.

You just have to press the right key. :)

Please, share your thoughts and have fun!
